text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1986. ==Events== ==Debuts== *June 30 - Xou da Xuxa (1986-1992) ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ==Ending this year== *Balão Mágico (TV series) (1983-1986) ==Births== *29 April - Monique Alfradique, actress *14 June - Klebber Toledo, actor & model *14 September - Giovanna Ewbank, actress & model *9 December - Bruno Gissoni, actor ==Deaths== ==See also== *1986 in Brazil
title: 1986 in Brazilian television
